Welcome at YAPC, better: YAPC welcomes me the first time. I usually go only to LISP conferences. Perl is normally easy enough, that I did not need Perl conferences and meetings in the last 15 years.
Fixed most bugs (in work) bytecode: 12=>0, c: 6=>1, cc: 9=>5, 5.14 CVs .plc platform compatible, almost version compatible (.plc header change) added testsuite more and better optimisations (in work) B::C::Flags (customised extra_cflags + extra_libs) removed B::Stash bloat from perlcc, -stash [optional]
